data.text: @EmmaStarkey11 @SunshineStyle83 @GreetSj @DrEricLevi You’re not reading it correctly- or the people you sincerely want to believe aren’t…
@AlonsosLeftBoot @TheosTina @catelizlouise @DrEricLevi We have to, lives are at stake.

@radswan1 @MartyC88620765 @DrEricLevi But too scared to go and investigate at a hospital yourself? Seems you may be the scared one. Does it makes you feel strong to write mean little words to doctors saving peoples lives, as you’re too scared to go to a hospital?

@ABertwhistle @TheosTina @catelizlouise @DrEricLevi @TheosTina describes a perfect example of the issue w mandatory vaccines.
Most of what u have said is correct.
But the obvious answer to someone who can critically analyse the research is be vaccinated. It’s not even close.

We can’t force people who don’t get there on their own.

@DrEricLevi You sound like a skilled and caring doctor. I loved your RAT videos and passed them on to anyone who was interested. Also you make me laugh with your dad jokes.  Please ignore the rabble below.
